Previously, we reported compound 10 among a series of pyrrolizine-5-carboxamide derivatives with potent cytotoxic activity against MCF-7 cells
23 . Although compound 10 was able to activate caspase 3/7 in MCF-7 cells, but the exact mechanism of action of this compound was not investigated. Recently, we reported different pyrrolizine derivatives with weak to moderate inhibitory activities against 20 oncogenic kinases
24
,
25 . Among these kinases, CDK-2 was the most affected one by all the tested compounds.
